body:
This fixes rendering issues with documentation where the `sphinx_rtd_theme` stylesheet was not making it into the rendered docs.

Compare:
* https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest
* https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/docs-rtd_fix/

This also means that developers will need to manually install `sphinx-rtd-theme`.  The docs and `lib/spack/docs/requirements.txt` have been updated to reflect that.
title: docs: remove vendored sphinx_rtd_theme
